title: Determining Events
text: The list of outcomes for an event A is all the possible outcomes that occur under that event. In this scenario, we can represent each outcome as each pair of ordered whole numbers such that the sum between them is even.

title: Determining the Outcomes
text: Knowing the definition of an event, what then, is the list of possible outcomes of ordered pairs of whole numbers such that the sum between the pair is even? What are the outcomes that together represent A?
